ComicInfo.Summary:
J. Michael Straczynski & ACO unleash another brutal issue! The revenge tour continues as The Madness tracks down the team of government-sanctioned superheroes who killed her family and left her in a shattered mental state. Can Agent X-9 withstand the brutal interrogation that awaits him? Or will he give up the plot that was hatched against Sarah and her family?
